elml:entry.title: Einleitung
elml:entry.paragraph: Die Lerneinheit (Unit) ist der zentrale Baustein einer Lektion. Eine Lektion kann mehrere Lerneinheiten enthalten. Diese wiederum beinhalten ein oder mehrere zu vermittelnde Sachverhalte (learning objects).

elml:selfAssessment.label: LselfAssess4
elml:selfAssessment.metaSetUpInfo: Here you can describe (in plain text) what the tutor who is using this lesson has to do to make the lesson useable. There might be written that the tutor has to setup a quiz in WebCT or that they have to look if a certain website is still online (if not they have to find another one or write an alternative link into the course information :-)). This tag will be queryable in some or the other way so that the tutor creating a course out of different lessons doesn't need to browse through all lessons to find what is needed but only gets a list of all 'metaSetUpInfo'. This tag is mandatory. If there is no need to write something into it then write 'none'.
